ComicInfo.Title: Epilogue; Secrets; Aunt Danielle and the Cage; The Ruby Necklace; Dress Up Games; Forbidden Drawings
ComicInfo.Summary:
Epilogue: Now a successful erotic artist, Emily passes the ruby necklace on to a novice writer in the repressed situation Emily had been in.
Secrets: Sophie puts on the ruby necklace and immediately begins experiencing erotic fantasies about herself and Emily.
Aunt Danielle and the Cage: Emily is enticed to participate in an erotic dungeon scenario.
The Ruby Necklace: Emily receives a ruby necklace from Aunt Danielle that begins to surreptitiously boost her erotic fantasies.
Dress Up Games: Emily's curiosity leads her to a surprising discovery in her Aunt Danielle's wardrobe.
Forbidden Drawings: Emily is a budding young artist whose growing libido begins to dominate her art and her waking moments.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:29:11. [Issue ID 769652]
